title: Ep. 136 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 2)
itunes:title: Ep. 136 - A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas (PART 2)
description:
Greetings, HBs, from the 4 walls of our homes to the 4 walls of yours! In this episode, we cover chapters 11-27 of A Court of Wings and Ruin by Sarah J. Maas! Feyre and Lucien go on a freezing danger roadtrip, Feyre gets a taste for Eris's ropes of fire, Lucien gets super abandoned in Velaris so Feyre can do some reunited boning with her one true love, Nesta is (shockingly) an even bigger bitch, Amren is still a sexy monster (but now with books!), we still can't decipher what, exactly, Rhysand's role is, and the gang is trying to save that wall! The fate of Perineum depends on it! 
 Bonus Content: Erin needs to apologize to you (she doesn't), it's #QuarantineTimes and HB is reflecting that, we go to the Autumn Court and it's #allbasicallthetime, Erin is a super hot task master and Melody doesn't care, Erin's got PIPING HOT TAKES, and #justiceforeris and his flaming ball gag? Plus, so much more! We really want to do the brilliance of SJM and our love for the books justice, while still remaining our goofy selves, so we're not sure how many parts this will be. Strap in and strap on, everyone! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: Dye your eyebrows if you face needs more definition without effort every day! 
 Erin: Get into the trashiest reality TV you can find, like the dirty raccoon you are!
 Episode Sponsor: 
  THE SINNER by JR Ward! It's #18 in her Black Dagger Brotherhood Series.
 For tons of bonus content, shout outs, and gifts, check out our PATREON!  Subscribe! Rate! Review! 
 Merch: Redbubble
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
  Facebook
 Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
